post.description: Fetches an image from the provided URL, performs OCR to extract numbers, and returns their coordinates.

get.description: Search for models using the required model number. Each variant is treated as a distinct entity with its own model number. The model number is essential for retrieving detailed information and accessing further data in our system.

application/json.message: No details found for the specified model ID

post.summary: Get an answer from the AI model.

model_id.description: The ID of the AI model.

prompt.description: The prompt for the AI model.
prompt.example: What is the capital of France?

answer.description: The answer generated by the AI model.
answer.example: The capital of France is Paris.

prompt.description: The prompt for the AI model.
prompt.example: What is the capital of France?

answer.example: The capital of France is Paris.

get.description: This endpoint allows users to retrieve a comprehensive list of all categories available in the system. Categories represent different classifications or groups into which appliances are organized.

Retrieve a comprehensive list of all manufactures stored in the database. This endpoint allows users to access information about each manufacture, including their names, unique identifiers, and associated categories. The search can be refined using query parameters such as manufacture_id, manufacture name, or any other specific criteria.

200.description: A list of manufactures with their details.

404.description: No manufactures found. The search did not return any results for the provided criteria.

example.message: No manufactures found for the search criteria

get.summary: Get all categories of a manufacture by ID
get.description: Retrieve a list of all categories associated with a specific manufacture. You need to provide the manufacture-id in the path to get the categories related to that manufacture.

200.description: A list of categories associated with the specified manufacture.

404.description: No categories found for the provided manufacture ID.

example.message: No categories found for the specified manufacture ID

get.description: Fetch detailed information for a specific model using its unique model-id. The response includes various details about the model, including its description, stock photo, diagrams, and associated manufacture information.

200.description: Detailed information about the specified model, including its description, stock photo, diagrams, and manufacture information.

404.description: Model not found. The search did not return any results for the provided model ID.

example.message: No details found for the specified model ID

get.summary: Get All Assets of a Model
get.description: Retrieve a comprehensive list of all documents and assets associated with a specific model. To use this endpoint, provide the model-id as a path parameter. The response includes various types of documents related to the model, such as the Owner's Manual, Energy Guide, Specification Sheet, Installation Instructions, Troubleshooting Guide, and Dimension Guide.

200.description: A list of documents and assets associated with the specified model, including Owner's Manual, Energy Guide, Specification Sheet, Installation Instructions, Troubleshooting Guide, and Dimension Guide.

404.description: No assets found for the provided model ID. The search did not return any results for the specified model.

example.message: No assets found for the specified model ID

get.summary: Get All Exploded Diagrams of a Model
get.description: Retrieve a comprehensive list of all exploded diagrams associated with a specific model. To use this endpoint, provide the model-id as a path parameter. The response includes details of each exploded diagram related to the model, such as diagram identifiers, titles, and related images.

200.description: A list of exploded diagrams associated with the specified model.

404.description: No exploded diagrams found for the provided model ID. The search did not return any results for the specified model.

example.message: No exploded diagrams found for the specified model ID

get.summary: Get All Interactive Exploded Diagrams of a Model
get.description: Retrieve a comprehensive list of all interactive exploded diagrams related to a specific model. To use this endpoint, provide the model-id as a path parameter. The response includes details for each interactive exploded diagram, such as diagram identifiers, titles, and interactive features.

200.description: A list of interactive exploded diagrams associated with the specified model, including their images and interactive features.

404.description: No interactive exploded diagrams found for the provided model ID. The search did not return any results for the specified model.

example.message: No interactive exploded diagrams found for the specified model ID

get.description: Retrieve a comprehensive list of all parts associated with a specific model. To use this endpoint, provide the model-id as a path parameter. The response includes details of all parts related to the model, such as part numbers, part name and manufacture.

404.description: No parts found that match the provided search criteria.

example.message: No parts found for the model ID

get.description: Retrieve a list of parts based on various search criteria. You can search by manufacture_id, category_id, offset, number, and name. These parameters can be used individually or in combination to refine the search results.

200.description: A list of parts that match the search criteria. Each part includes details such as part ID, name, manufacture ID, category ID, and other relevant information.

404.description: No parts found that match the provided search criteria.

example.message: No parts found for the specified search parameters

get.summary: Get All Exploded Diagrams of a Part
get.description: Retrieve a comprehensive list of all exploded diagrams related to a specific part. To use this endpoint, provide the part-id as a path parameter. The response includes details for each exploded diagram associated with the part, such as diagram identifiers, titles, and related images.

200.description: A list of exploded diagrams associated with the specified part.

404.description: No exploded diagrams found for the provided part ID. The search did not return any results for the specified part.

example.message: No exploded diagrams found for the specified part ID

get.summary: Get All Models of a Part
get.description: Retrieve a comprehensive list of all models that use a specific part. To use this endpoint, provide the part-id as a path parameter. The response includes details for each model associated with the part, such as model identifiers, names, and descriptions.

200.description: A list of models associated with the specified part.

404.description: No models found for the provided part ID. The search did not return any results for the specified part.

example.message: No models found for the specified part ID

get.summary: Get Replacement Parts of a Part
get.description: Retrieve a comprehensive list of all parts that can replace a specific part. To use this endpoint, provide the part-id as a path parameter. The response includes details for each replacement part, such as part identifiers and names.

200.description: A list of replacement parts associated with the specified part.

404.description: No replacement parts found for the provided part ID. The search did not return any results for the specified part.

example.message: No replacement parts found for the specified part ID

get.description: This endpoint allows users to retrieve all connected models associated with a specific asset (Manual/Doc). The asset-id is required to query the database and fetch the relevant details.

example.message: No model found for given Asset ID

get.description: Fetch detailed information for a specific error code by its unique identifier. This endpoint allows users to search for error code details, providing comprehensive information including code, description, and related troubleshooting steps. Users can search by manufacture_id, category_id, or error code. Additionally, these parameters can be combined to refine the search results.

200.description: Detailed information about the error code.

404.description: Error code not found. The search did not return any results for the provided identifier.

example.message: No Code detail found for search item

info.title: OnSense APIs
info.description:
The OnSense APIs provides a robust and comprehensive solution for managing both appliance-related data and customer interactions. It efficiently handles appliance models, parts, error codes, technical manuals, exploded diagrams, customer inquiries, support tickets, AI agents, chat, logs, and service history, enabling effective management, troubleshooting, and improved customer satisfaction.

To access the API, click the 'Authorize' button and enter your token in the format: Bearer auth-token.

To facilitate your experience, we have developed a web UI where you can review and interact with the API. Explore it at https://try.macaan.ai/.

For any further questions or to discuss the API in more detail, please contact your account representative to schedule a technical consultation.
